transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello, haan ji?

Executive: Haan, namaskar sir.

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Sir Alok Pandey bol raha hun IndiaMART se.

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Call kiya tha aapko sir. Actually sir us time pe main thoda meeting me chala gaya. Ek ghante baad. Abhi bataye sir aapne call kiya tha IndiaMART se sir kya issue tha iske andar?

Customer: Call sir isliye kiya tha apne kya bolte hain jo inquiry generate hoti hai na daily.

Executive: Ji ji.

Customer: Inquiry nahi generate ho rahi sir. Limited si aa rahi hai.

Executive: By leads aapko mil rahi hai?

Customer: By leads by leads to aa rahi hai sir. 100 kuch ke something milti hai ek week ki.

Executive: Jitni bhi purchase kar sakte hain wo sab koi problem nahi hai. Jo inquiry generate hoti hai wo nahi generate hoti.

Executive: 71 milti hai. 71 milti hai sir aapko.

Customer: 71 nahi milti 100 ke something milti hai sir.

Executive: Aapne theek liya aapne kafi purana ho sir aapki jo service hai na star service.

Customer: Chalo koi baat nahi sir 70 70 ke something.

Executive: 71.

Customer: 71 hai. Theek hai ji ji. Aur jo inquiry generate hoti hai wo one ek month mein 12000 ke something hoti hai.

Executive: Inquiry ka to sir dekhiye koi matlab ye nahi hai jitna customer aapko dekhega jitni visibility hoga us hisab se aapko inquiry aati hai.

Customer: Sir pehle to mere paas daily ki 100 ke kareeb aati thi 1000 100 ke kareeb aati thi inquiry.

Executive: Ji. Ji ji.

Customer: Ab sir din mein aati hai 10 15 maximum 20.

Executive: Visibility kahin na kahin down hui hogi sir ek baar baith ke kahiye to video meeting aapko link bhej do sir. Video meeting karke dekh lete hain sir kahan kahan visibility down hui hai.

Customer: Sir dekhiye inquiry ka main reason to aap samajh rahe honge sir ki inquiry agar customer aapko karega to aapki dekhega to call message karega sir. Hai na sir?

Executive: Ye ek baar dekhna jaruri hoga sir ki aapke jo air pistol hai ya fir air rifle jo bhi aapne listing kara rakhi hai jis jis shahar mein aapne listing kari hai sir. Aisa to nahi hai us us shahar mein koi aapse upar aake listed ho gaya ho. Ya fir aisa kuch scenario ho.

Customer: Wo to IndiaMART ke hath mein hai kisko upar karne ke kisko niche karna hai.

Executive: Nahi nahi sir IndiaMART ke hath mein nahi hai sir IndiaMART ki services hai jo bada service use karega wo upar rahega sir. Aisa nahi hai sir.

Executive: Hum kisko upar niche karenge sir. Paid services jo log use karte hain sir jaisa pay karte hain sir unko waisi visibility to deni padegi na sir. Aap hi bataye sir.

Customer: Aap bhi sir shayad pistol mein rifle mein business kar rahe ho sir. Aap bhi to sir jo achcha paisa de raha hoga usko achchi quality ki rifles dete honge. Nahi dega sir usko wo to fir market ka scenario hai.

Customer: Abhi aapko back call karta hu ji.

Executive: Back call. Nahi nahi main keh raha tha sir jo back call maine aapka call miss kar diya tha isliye puch raha tha. To aapka koi aisa to concern nahi tha sir nahi to main fir ye ek complaint khul jati hai executive ke khilaf.

Customer: Isi ke isi ke liye isi ke liye maine call kiya tha inquiry generate nahi ho rahi hai.

Executive: Achcha achcha nahi sir aap time de video meeting ka us pe achche se brief mein discuss karte hain ek baar.

Customer: To 5 baje karte hain connect.

Executive: Kitne baje sir?

Customer: 5 baje sham ko.

Executive: 5 baje ka video meeting rakhu sir?

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Theek hai sir main abhi link send kar deta hun 5 baje ka.

Customer: Theek hai sir. Bhejiye sir. Okay sir.

Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Inquiries are not generating as expected.

- Earlier, customer received 100 inquiries daily.

- Now receiving only 10-20 inquiries daily.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting to discuss visibility issues.

- Executive explained visibility depends on service usage.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for 5 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- inquiries, visibility, video meeting, buyleads
